name: Momogical
description:
Momogical is a small and simple story point-and-click game.

A little girl with too much imagination is confronted with daily life tasks given to her by her mom. Momo is her name and she loves magical things but she needs to clean her room and study for her upcoming exam. Trying her own methods of navigating life, she does what she believes will work to complete the tasks.

I hope you enjoyed it! Thank you for playing!

The sounds might be a bit glitchy on the WebGL build, if you want you can download the desktop version which is more stable.

References

The assets were hand-drawn using Clip Paint Studio.

The game was programmed using Unity.

Background music:

"Falling Star" by Composer: Dar Golan

Sound effects from freesound.org:

- "Page Turn (2)" by DrMinky
- "Key_Chimes_03_Short-Shake.wav" by dheming
- "Creature Hiss" by columbia23
- "Crunch noise" by Hourofmidnight
- "Pencil, Writing, Close, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk)

Momogical by Melissa Lim
